# canStepBackward

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping backward.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var canStepBackward: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Once the item becomes ready to play, the value of this property does not change. This behavior applies even when boundary conditions, such as when the item’s current time is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/zero], have been reached.

## Stepping through media

- **canStepForward**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping forward.
- **step(byCount:)**: Moves the player item’s current time forward or backward by a specified number of steps.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping forward.
items.name: canStepForward

items.description: Moves the player item’s current time forward or backward by a specified number of steps.
items.name: step(byCount:)
